amendment.description: An amendment numbered 143 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section at the end of the bill titled No Effect on Existing Leasing Restrictions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaLota amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. LaLota.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaLota amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
